value.title: AMD is taking the gloves off in the AI arms race
value.excerpt: AMD looks ready to fight. At its Advancing AI event, the company finally launched its Instinct MI300X AI GPU, which we first heard about first a few months ago. The exciting development is the performance AMD is claiming compared to the green AI elephant in the room: Nvidia.

value.title: Yotta Challenges Hyperscalers with India’s First AI-Centric GPU Cloud
value.excerpt: The roadmap includes 4k GPU cluster, scaling up to 16,384 GPUs by June 2024. The intent is to reach an unprecedented 32,768 GPUs by late 2025.

value.title: Meta and Microsoft say they will buy AMD's new AI chip as an alternative to Nvidia
value.excerpt: If AMD's latest high-end chip, MI300X, is good enough and inexpensive enough for the technology companies and cloud service providers building and serving AI models when it starts shipping early next year, it could lower costs for developing AI models.

value.title: EnCharge raises $22.6M to commercialize its AI-accelerating chips
value.excerpt: EnCharge was launched to commercialize Verma’s research. Using in-memory computing, EnCharge’s hardware can accelerate AI applications in servers and “network edge” machines, Verma claims, while reducing power consumption relative to standard computer processors.

value.title: NVIDIA warned: redesign a GPU for AI for China, US government will stop them the next day
value.excerpt: US Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo has warned that we 'cannot' let China get the most powerful AI chips in the world, throws shade at NVIDIA.

value.title: Nvidia is promising to help Japan get the AI chips it needs for a network of new datacenters
value.excerpt: Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang speaking at COMPUTEX 2023 in Taipei. Huang said on Tuesday that Nvidia will partner with Japanese firms to build chip plants in Japan to meet AI demand. Walid Berrazeg—SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images Nvidia CEO Jensen ...

value.title: Can Broadcom’s latest silicon AI chip revolutionize network efficiency?
value.excerpt: Broadcom's Trident 5-X12 chip revolutionizes AI cluster networking with advanced AI and neural network technology.

value.title: AWS and Nvidia partner on Project Ceiba, a GPU-powered AI supercomputer
value.excerpt: The companies are extending their AI partnership, and one key initiative is a supercomputer that will be integrated with AWS services and used by Nvidia’s own R&D teams.

value.title: First switch with on-chip neural network
value.excerpt: Broadcom Inc. has introduced what it claims is the first switch with an on-chip, neural network inference engine. Called Trident 5-X12, the software-programmable switch uses the networking general-purpose neural-network traffic analyzer (NetGNT) to double bandwidth and reduce power by 25% compared to previous devices.

value.title: Is AMD Stock A Buy At $120 As It Doubles Down On AI-Focused GPUs?
value.excerpt: That being said, much of the surge in the stock appears to be coming from mounting interest in the company’s graphics processing business.

value.title: AI fatigue, sales challenges, and the problem of getting big: Inside growing tension at AWS
value.excerpt: AWS is the dominant cloud provider. That success brings new challenges. The emergence of generative AI is adding to internal tensions.

value.title: Nvidia RTX 3080 ex-cryptomining cards are being turned into 20GB AI accelerators in China
value.excerpt: Modders showed it's possible to upgrade the card to a more AI-friendly 20GB by replacing the 1GB chips with 2GB alternatives. It's likely that the RTX 3080 cards had been used by cryptominers looking to offload their hardware following digital currencies ...

value.title: AWS Launches New Chips for AI Training and Its Own AI Chatbot
value.excerpt: Invent, NVIDIA contributed GPUs to Amazon's cloud efforts and added a retriever system to its AI Enterprise Software platform on AWS Marketplace.

value.title: China Circumvents GPU Ban By Stripping GeForce RTX 3090 Cards As AI Race Heats Up
value.excerpt: With the stock of GeForce RTX 4090 disappearing rapidly, China has turned to the GeForce RTX 3090 as a backup choice.

value.title: AWS unveils new Trainium AI chip and Graviton 4, extends Nvidia partnership
value.excerpt: In addition to the two new chips, Amazon said it extended its strategic partnership with AI chip giant Nvidia. AWS will be the first cloud service to run the forthcoming GH200 Grace Hopper multi-chip product from Nvidia, which combines the Grace ARM-based CPU and the Hopper H100 GPU chip.

value.title: Introducing three new NVIDIA GPU-based Amazon EC2 instances
value.excerpt: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) accelerated computing portfolio offers the broadest choice of accelerators to power your artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning (ML), graphics, and high performance computing (HPC) workloads. We are excited to announce the expansion of this portfolio

value.title: Groq Says It Can Deploy 1 Million AI Inference Chips In Two Years
value.excerpt: If you are looking for an alternative to Nvidia GPUs for AI inference – and who isn’t these days with generative AI being the hottest thing since a volcanic eruption – then you might want to give Groq a call.

value.title: New “Stable Video Diffusion” AI model can animate any still image
value.excerpt: On Tuesday, Stability AI released Stable Video Diffusion, a new free AI research tool that can turn any still image into a short video—with mixed results. It's an open-weights preview of two AI models that use a technique called image-to-video, and it can run locally on a machine with an Nvidia GPU.

value.title: Opinion: Nvidia looks poised to lead AI — but there’s one big question about its growth
value.excerpt: The driver of this growth is its data center segment, responsible for the GPU (graphics processing units) and chips that have been powering high-performance computing...

value.title: AI Chip Boom Fuels Taiwan Firm’s 40% Rally, Beating Qualcomm and Peers
value.excerpt: A five-month rally in MediaTek Inc. looks set to extend as booming demand for smartphones and a promising new AI chip brighten the outlook.

value.title: Microsoft Debuts Custom Chips for Cloud and AI: Azure Maia AI Accelerator and Azure Cobalt CPU
value.excerpt: During the recent Ignite conference, Microsoft introduced two custom-designed chips for their cloud infrastructure: Microsoft Azure Maia AI Accelerator (Athena), optimized for artificial intelligence (AI) tasks and generative AI,

value.title: The Future Of AI Is At The Edge: Cloudflare Leads The Way
value.excerpt: Cloudflare is one of the first CDN and edge network providers to enhance its edge network with AI capabilities through GPU-powered Workers AI, vector database and an AI Gateway for AI deployment management. Partnering with tech giants like Meta and Microsoft, it is offering a wide model catalog and ONNX Runtime optimization.

value.title: Nvidia Delays Launch of AI Chip for China amid Export Compliance Challenges, NVDA Stock 1% Down
value.excerpt: Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ: NVDA), the California-based AI chip giant, has notified its Chinese customers of a delay in the launch of its new artificial intelligence chip, H20, designed to comply with the latest United States export regulations, Reuters reported Friday, citing two sources familiar with the matter.

value.title: AI drives chip sector recovery
value.excerpt: The growing demand for AI applications has made a visible impact on the semiconductor sectorGlobal semiconductor sector revenues have grown for two

value.title: Nvidia delays rollout of new custom-made AI chip for China, shares dip
value.excerpt: Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) has informed Chinese customers of a delay in launching its new artificial intelligence chip, the H20, designed to comply with U.S. export rules. Shares in the chipmaker declined 2.2% in pre-market Friday trade.

value.title: Thousands of RTX 4090 GPUs Are Being Rebuilt for AI Computing in China
value.excerpt: In China, Nvidia's RTX 4090 is being repurposed in the thousands. The GPU components are taken out, and put in a new PCB and cooler design!

value.title: Intel Talks Expansion, Meteor Lake And The Importance Of AI On The PC.
value.excerpt: Intel's new Fab 34 manufacturing facility in Ireland is where its Meteor Lake next generation processors will be made. The facility is hugely important

value.title: Artificial Intelligence: Are AI chips different from traditional processors
value.excerpt: AI chips executes numerous calculations parallelly, exhibiting remarkable speed and efficiency advantage over CPUs

value.title: Nvidia’s GeForce GPUs are selling well, but its AI GPU sales are ridiculous
value.excerpt: Most Ars readers still probably know Nvidia best for its decades-old GeForce graphics cards for gaming PCs, but these days Nvidia's server GPU business makes GeForce look like a hobby project.

value.title: Nvidia Q3 Earnings Explode On Surging Data Center AI And Gaming Demand
value.excerpt: There’s no stopping Nvidia from this level of growth for the foreseeable future. The company continues to execute like a finely tuned machine.
